statements: SELECT * FROM employee_turnover;
SELECT name, joining_date, leaving_date FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_leaving = 'Better opportunity';
SELECT employee_id, name, joining_date FROM employee_turnover WHERE leaving_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, reason_for_leaving FROM employee_turnover ORDER BY leaving_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT reason_for_leaving FROM employee_turnover;
SELECT name, joining_date, leaving_date FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_leaving LIKE '%new opportunity%' ORDER BY joining_date DESC, name ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover WHERE joining_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT name, reason_for_leaving FROM employee_turnover WHERE leaving_date IS NULL ORDER BY name
SELECT employee_id, name, retention_improvement_strategies FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_leaving = 'poor work environment' ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT reason_for_leaving FROM employee_turnover ORDER BY reason_for_leaving ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover_rates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, turnover_rate FROM employee_turnover_rates WHERE turnover_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT reason FROM reasons_for_leaving WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_leaving ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(turnover_rate) AS avg_turnover FROM employee_turnover_rates GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(turnover_rate) > 0.05 ORDER BY avg_turnover DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover_rates WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(turnover_rate) AS total_turnover FROM employee_turnover_rates GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_turnover > 0.8
SELECT employee_id, reason, date FROM reasons_for_leaving WHERE reason LIKE '%better opportunity%' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_turnover_rates WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, AVG(turnover_rate) AS avg_rate FROM employee_turnover_rates GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY avg_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover;
SELECT name, position FROM employee_turnover WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, position FROM employee_turnover ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_leaving WHERE reason_id > 2;
SELECT strategy_name AS 'Retention Strategy', improvement_area AS 'Improvement Area' FROM retention_strategies;
SELECT name, position FROM employee_turnover ORDER BY date_joined DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT e.name, r.reason_description FROM employee_turnover e JOIN reasons_for_leaving r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE r.reason_description LIKE '%better opportunity%'

SELECT e.name, r.reason_description, s.strategy_name FROM employee_turnover e LEFT JOIN reasons_for_leaving r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id LEFT JOIN retention_strategies s ON e.position = s.strategy_name
SELECT name, position, date_joined, date_left FROM employee_turnover WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_joined ASC
SELECT name, position, date_left FROM employee_turnover WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY date_left DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover;
SELECT employee_id, reason_for_leaving FROM employee_turnover WHERE turnover_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS highest_rating FROM employee_ratings;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_retention_analysis FROM retention_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, improvement_areas FROM retention_strategies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT id, turnover_date FROM employee_turnover WHERE turnover_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, reason_for_leaving FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_leaving LIKE '%personal reasons%';
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Mentoring Program';
SELECT id, improvement_areas FROM retention_strategies WHERE improvement_areas LIKE '%compensation%';
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY emp_id DESC;
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM Employee WHERE emp_department = 'HR';
SELECT emp_name, start_date, reason_for_leaving FROM Employee WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM Employee WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT dep_name FROM Department JOIN Employee ON Department.manager_id = Employee.emp_id;
SELECT emp_id, emp_name, emp_department FROM Employee WHERE emp_department = 'HR';
SELECT emp_name, start_date, end_date FROM Employee WHERE reason_for_leaving IS NOT NULL ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT emp_id, emp_name, emp_department, start_date FROM Employee ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT emp_name, COUNT(emp_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM Feedback GROUP BY emp_name HAVING total_feedbacks > 1 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;

SELECT emp_name, dep_name, turnover_rate FROM Employee JOIN Department ON Employee.emp_department = Department.dep_id JOIN TurnoverRate ON Employee.emp_id = TurnoverRate.emp_id WHERE turnover_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
